! gopm -c gopmconfig --quit-delay 0 -p gopmextra
stderr 'error:CUE path must be a file, found directory "gopmextra"'

-- gopmconfig/config.cue --
package config

config: grpc_server: {
	network: "unix"
	address: "gopm.socket"
}

-- gopmextra/options.cue --
package config

config: programs: sleeper: {
	command: """
		echo hello
		"""
}
